channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 42 St Gabriel’s Road, 23rd August
item.description:
There are a few potholes on the road - this one is incredibly dangerous for children on bikes. We run a family bike group that takes children to school. These are on the route and could unseat riders.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): St Gabriels Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two mattresses have been fly tipped, 23rd August
item.description:
The mattresses have been left on the pavement causing obstruction, and against my property fence. I noticed it today, they were possibly left yesterday/ today. I'd appreciate if they can be removed ASAP

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 60, The Crescent, Park Langley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly-tipping, 23rd August
item.description:
There has been further fly-tipping on Coxmount Road. This has been going on for year. PLEASE SORT THIS OUT AND PUT CAMERAS UP SO YOU CAN FINE THESE PEOPLE AND PUT AN END TO THIS!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Coxmount Road, Charlton Riverside, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Uneven surface, 23rd August
item.description:
An uneven surface across Upper Holloway Road adjecant to St Johns Grove is causing major vibrations and trembling in the nearby flats whenever heavier vehicles pass over it causing nuisance and distress for local residents, has been an apparent issue for a few months now

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 750, Holloway Road, Archway, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Stolen bike, 23rd August
item.description:
It's been stashed behind bushes in front of my front side door. Been there for over a week, please remove it, don't know who put it there, it's a private entryway.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Fountayne Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish everywhere in front of 147 snowsfields, 23rd August
item.description:
The bin bags left out overnight were ripped up by foxes leaving lots of rubbish outside our flat. This happens at least biweekly and rats have been spotted.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 57-70, Hardwidge Street, The Borough, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This drain lid is swelling up on pavement outside our house. Tripping hazard as shown., 23rd August
item.description:
This drain has been spewing out water and other debris which gas gradually worsened over the past 4 months. I thought it was the remit of Thames Water and I have reported it 4 times in the last 4 months. I have had no response and I am very concerned. The cover is protruding as seen in photo. The drain is over flowing and lots of gunk is coming out with it. It is a hazard as anyone walking down the pavement could trip. We have a lot of elderly people residing in our road. Please can this be resolved as soon as possible. It is definitely an urgent matter now. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Hayes Chase, Park Langley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street Light Not Working, 23rd August
item.description:
The street lamp outside 7-8 Coniston Walk has not been working for several months. This means that the area is very dark in the evening and night time. This is not safe for people on there way home in the area as it creates a very large dark spot.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Coniston Walk, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
